ruleset.name: Custom Scala Ruleset
ruleset.description: Custom ruleset for identifying specific Scala code patterns.

rule.name: AvoidVar
rule.description: Using 'var' makes code mutable. Prefer 'val' for immutability.

rule.name: UnusedLocalVariable
rule.description: Unused local variables should be removed to clean up the code.

rule.name: AvoidNonScalaCollections
rule.message: Prefer Scala collections over Java collections
rule.description: Use Scala collections instead of Java collections for consistency and better integration.

rule.name: AvoidLiteralsInLoop
rule.message: Avoid using literals in loop conditions
rule.description: Using literals in loop conditions can lead to inefficient code. Consider alternatives or parameterization.

rule.name: UnusedImports
rule.description: Unused import statements should be removed to keep the code clean.

rule.name: EmptyCatchBlock
rule.description: Empty catch blocks should be avoided. At least log an exception.
